meanings: (정보나 지식을 갖추다) know, learn, have (good) knowledge (of), be familiar (with)
(이해하다) understand, know, see, follow, appreciate, (informal) get, make out
(깨닫다, 인지하다) realize, recognize, find, notice, sense, (formal) perceive, be aware (of), be conscious (of)
Knowing too much is a disease; Where ignorance is bliss, it is folly to be wise; Ignorance is the peace of life
Knowing too much is a disease; Where ignorance is bliss, it is folly to be wise; Ignorance is the peace of life
in the manner of one being unaware of something, unwittingly
It is not of one's concern
think one knows something, but actually does not know it

vlive.korean: [느낌 아니까~] [I know how this is supposed to be~] View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.13
vlive.english: [I know how this is supposed to be~]

vlive.korean: 맞아 그걸 아니까 누굴 평가하고 싶지 않은데 그렇지? I know that and I don't want to evaluate someone. Right? 듣기 View video TWICE : 밥
vlive.english: I know that and I don't want to evaluate someone. Right?

vlive.korean: 그러니까 나는 노래 아니까 노래는 안 궁금한데, 노래는 아니까 - 응, 근데? I know the song so I'm not curious about the song but... - Then what? 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 즐거운 일요일 😆
vlive.english: I know the song so I'm not curious about the song but... - Then what?

vlive.korean: [속사포] 가사 아니까 저희끼리 보고 하면 안 돼요? [Super fast] Can't we face each other since we know the lyrics? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.2
vlive.english: [Super fast] Can't we face each other since we know the lyrics?

vlive.korean: 애들이 네가 내 여자친군 줄 아니까 나도 그 정도 알고 있어야지! People think that you're my girlfriend so that's the least you can tell me! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나를 괴롭히던 일진의 과거는? [일진에게 찍혔을 때] EP05
vlive.english: People think that you're my girlfriend so that's the least you can tell me!

examples.korean: Knowing Ben, we could be waiting a long time. 발음듣기 벤을 잘 아니까 하는 말인데, 우리가 오래 기다려야 할 거예요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Knowing Ben, we could be waiting a long time. 발음

examples.korean: You know more, so I submit to your decision. 발음듣기 네가 더 많이 아니까 네 결정에 따를께. Neungyule
examples.english: You know more, so I submit to your decision. 발음

examples.korean: But, I know how much you love Chinese food, so I'm thinking about picking up some take-out. 발음듣기 하지만 당신이 중국 음식을 얼마나 좋아하는지 아니까 중국 음식을 좀 살까해. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: But, I know how much you love Chinese food, so I'm thinking about picking up some take-out. 발음

examples.korean: That's natural, but you know the material and once you get started, you'll feel more relaxed. 발음듣기 당연한 거예요. 하지만 발표 내용을 잘 아니까 일단 시작하면 긴장이 좀 풀릴 거예요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That's natural, but you know the material and once you get started, you'll feel more relaxed. 발음

examples.korean: You can come with Brandon. He knows where I live. 발음듣기 브랜든이랑 같이 오면 돼. 그는 내가 어디 사는지 아니까. Neungyule
examples.english: You can come with Brandon. He knows where I live. 발음
